languages.text: "Я... Был полностью поглощен расследованием нападений по всему вашему протекторату. Я подозревал, что атаки ксеносов скрывают за собой нечто большее, но... атака на мир-столицу Вольного Торговца? Опрометчиво даже для друкари. Я даже подумать не мог..." {n}Служитель Инквизиции прикрывает глаза и виновато кривится.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я... Был полностью поглощен расследованием нападений по всей вашей торговой империи. Я подозревал, что атаки ксеносов скрывают за собой нечто большее, но... атака на мир-столицу Вольного Торговца? Опрометчиво даже для друкари. Я даже подумать не мог..." {n}Служитель Инквизиции прикрывает глаза и виновато кривится.{/n}

languages.text: "I... I focused all my attention on investigating the attacks across your protectorate. I suspected that there was something bigger behind the xenos attacks, but... an assault on the Rogue Trader's capital? Foolhardy, even for Drukhari. I'd never have thought..." {n}He closes his eyes, grimacing with guilt.{/n}

Я даже подумать не мог..." {n}Служитель Инквизиции прикрывает глаза и виновато кривится.{/n}

I'd never have thought..." {n}He closes his eyes, grimacing with guilt.{/n}

languages.text: 「へ…陛下の保護領におよんだ襲撃の調査に注力しておりました。異種族の襲撃には強大な黒幕がいるのではないかと疑っていましたが…まさか自由開拓者の首都を襲うとは。デュカーリとはいえ、無謀すぎます。まさかこんなことになるとは…」{n}彼は罪悪感に苛まれ、目を閉じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I focused all my attention on investigating the attacks across your protectorate. I suspected that there was something bigger behind the xenos attacks, but... an assault on the Rogue Trader's capital? Foolhardy, even for Drukhari. I'd never have thought..." {n}He closes his eyes, grimacing with guilt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「へ…陛下の保護領におよんだ襲撃の調査に注力しておりました。異種族の襲撃には強大な黒幕がいるのではないかと疑っていましたが…まさか自由開拓者の首都を襲うとは。デュカーリとはいえ、無謀すぎます。まさかこんなことになるとは…」{n}彼は罪悪感に苛まれ、目を閉じた。{/n}

languages.text: “我……我当时正全神贯注地调查着王朝各地的袭击事件，我怀疑异形袭击的背后，还有更大的阴谋。但是……我没想到他们居然会直接攻击行商浪人的首都。就算是对黑暗灵族而言，这也实在太无谋了。我真的没有想到……”{n}他一脸愧疚地闭上了双眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I focused all my attention on investigating the attacks across your protectorate. I suspected that there was something bigger behind the xenos attacks, but... an assault on the Rogue Trader's capital? Foolhardy, even for Drukhari. I'd never have thought..." {n}He closes his eyes, grimacing with guilt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我……我当时正全神贯注地调查着王朝各地的袭击事件，我怀疑异形袭击的背后，还有更大的阴谋。但是……我没想到他们居然会直接攻击行商浪人的首都。就算是对黑暗灵族而言，这也实在太无谋了。我真的没有想到……”{n}他一脸愧疚地闭上了双眼。{/n}

languages.text: «Había... Había centrado toda mi atención en investigar los ataques del resto del protectorado. Sospechaba que había algo más importante detrás de las incursiones xenos, pero... ¿un ataque contra la capital de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente? Es insensato hasta para los Drukhari. No me había planteado...». {n}Cierra los ojos, abrumado por la culpa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I focused all my attention on investigating the attacks across your protectorate. I suspected that there was something bigger behind the xenos attacks, but... an assault on the Rogue Trader's capital? Foolhardy, even for Drukhari. I'd never have thought..." {n}He closes his eyes, grimacing with guilt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Había... Había centrado toda mi atención en investigar los ataques del resto del protectorado. Sospechaba que había algo más importante detrás de las incursiones xenos, pero... ¿un ataque contra la capital de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente? Es insensato hasta para los Drukhari. No me había planteado...». {n}Cierra los ojos, abrumado por la culpa.{/n}

languages.text: « Je... Je me concentrais sur mon enquête concernant les attaques qui ont eu lieu dans le reste de votre protectorat. Je soupçonnais que ces assauts s'inscrivaient dans un plan plus complexe, mais... de là à s'en prendre à la capitale {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ? C'était vraiment téméraire, même pour des Drukharis. Je n'aurais jamais cru qu'ils en arriveraient là... » {n}Il ferme les yeux, assailli par la culpabilité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I focused all my attention on investigating the attacks across your protectorate. I suspected that there was something bigger behind the xenos attacks, but... an assault on the Rogue Trader's capital? Foolhardy, even for Drukhari. I'd never have thought..." {n}He closes his eyes, grimacing with guilt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je... Je me concentrais sur mon enquête concernant les attaques qui ont eu lieu dans le reste de votre protectorat. Je soupçonnais que ces assauts s'inscrivaient dans un plan plus complexe, mais... de là à s'en prendre à la capitale {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ? C'était vraiment téméraire, même pour des Drukharis. Je n'aurais jamais cru qu'ils en arriveraient là... » {n}Il ferme les yeux, assailli par la culpabilité.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich ... ich habe meine gesamte Aufmerksamkeit den Ermittlungen der Angriffe in Eurem Protektorat gewidmet. Ich hatte den Verdacht, dass etwas Größeres hinter den Xenos-Überfällen steckte, aber ... ein Angriff auf die Hauptstadt {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}? Das ist töricht, selbst für Drukhari. Ich hätte niemals erwartet ..." {n}Er schließt die Augen, die Miene schuldverzerrt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I focused all my attention on investigating the attacks across your protectorate. I suspected that there was something bigger behind the xenos attacks, but... an assault on the Rogue Trader's capital? Foolhardy, even for Drukhari. I'd never have thought..." {n}He closes his eyes, grimacing with guilt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... ich habe meine gesamte Aufmerksamkeit den Ermittlungen der Angriffe in Eurem Protektorat gewidmet. Ich hatte den Verdacht, dass etwas Größeres hinter den Xenos-Überfällen steckte, aber ... ein Angriff auf die Hauptstadt {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}? Das ist töricht, selbst für Drukhari. Ich hätte niemals erwartet ..." {n}Er schließt die Augen, die Miene schuldverzerrt.{/n}

languages.text: "Tüm... Tüm dikkatimi protektoranızdaki saldırıları araştırmaya vermiştim. Zeno saldırılarının ardında başka bir iş olduğunu sanıyordum da... Hür Tacir'in başkentine saldırmak mı? Drukhariler için bile aptalcaydı. Aklımdan bile geçmedi..." {n}Suçluluk hissini yansıtan gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... I focused all my attention on investigating the attacks across your protectorate. I suspected that there was something bigger behind the xenos attacks, but... an assault on the Rogue Trader's capital? Foolhardy, even for Drukhari. I'd never have thought..." {n}He closes his eyes, grimacing with guilt.{/n}

Drukhariler için bile aptalcaydı. Aklımdan bile geçmedi..." {n}Suçluluk hissini yansıtan gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n}
